Upload your medical records to get a detailed digitized reports and customised suggestions to improve your health. Just click on the “+” button to add a medical document.

It seems that you haven’t booked to any tickets yet.

Terms & Conditions:

1)Not refundable within 14 days of visit date. Refund of 75% before 14 days available upon request.
2)Purchase minimum of 24 hours before use.
3)Passport photo must be recent and recognizable (selfie is acceptable)
4)Lost tickets are non-refundable
5)Each ticket’s “day” sunrise to sunset
6)Ticket is valid for all Siem Reap temples and ruins but not for other districts of Cambodia (Example: Phnom Kulen, Beong Mealea, Koh Ker).

Angkor Passes and Prices :
1-day Pass = USD 37
3-day Pass = USD 62
7-day Pass = USD 72

Our services fee :
USD 1 per ticket for each pass

Delivery fee :
USD 1 per delivery to hotels or Guesthouses in Siem Reap (if clients need this delivery services, clients need to mention address, name of place, and receiving date/time).

Processing fee :
4% on the top of the total amount
